body.name: No-Drill Doorbell Mount for Ring Battery Video Doorbell 1/2/3/3 Plus/4/Plus/(2020 Release), Adhesive Steel Metal Doorbell Mounting Bracket Accessories for Apartment, Home, Business
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 31 mins
features: 【Compatible Model】:This Anti-Theft video doorbell wall mount holder is specifically designed for the Ring Battery Video doorbell 1/Video doorbell 2/Video doorbell 3/Video doorbell 3 Plus/Video doorbell 4/Video doorbell (2020 Release)/Battery doorbell Plus, others are not supported.(Doorbell is Not Included)

【Full Coverage Protection】: New upgraded design, real 360 degree protection stainless steel metal protection box, ideal for condo, apartment ,office room. There is a hidden security screw at the bottom and it is not easty to be stolen.
【Durable Material】: Made of high-strength stainless steel to ensure a long service life, and with anti-scratch door panel process.
【Easy Installation】:Two types of installation: using double-sided adhesive or screws, the package includes the toolkit and easy-to-follow instructions for an installation within minutes.

【Installation Tips】: When using VHB strong double-sided adhesive to install, it needs to be installed on a smooth and flat door or wall, such as tiles, glass, marble, wood, iron, etc. If it is an uneven wall surface, please use the included screws to install.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PUUUCI No-Drill Doorbell Mount for Ring Battery Video Doorbell 1/2/3/3 Plus/4/Plus/(2020 Release) PUUUCI are committed to creating good products that help make your home electronic products simpler and easier to use. Feature: ■ Compatible with Ring Battery Video doorbell 1/Video doorbell 2/Video doorbell 3/Video doorbell 3 Plus/Video doorbell 4/Video doorbell (2020 Release)/Battery doorbell Plus. ■ Stainless steel metal. ■ Full coverage protection. ■ Easy installation Package： 1 x Doorbell box, 1 x Screwdriver, 1 x Strong double-sided adhesive, 3 x Anti-theft screws, 3 x Fixing screws， 1 x Instruction Manual. Notice: The DoorBell is not included.
Two types of installation: Using double-sided adhesive or screws, the package includes the toolkit and easy-to-follow instructions for an installation within minutes.

Installation Tips: When using VHB strong double-sided adhesive to install, it needs to be installed on a smooth and flat door or wall, such as tiles, glass, marble, wood, iron, etc. If it is an uneven wall surface, please use the included screws to install.
The large frame of the metal protective case is perfectly designed for the Ring Battery Video Doorbell, which protects the doorbell without blocking the doorbell's camera and sensors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Anti theft mount
reviews.reviewText: If you have the ring camera then you DEFINITELY want to buy this ! It's awesome and it not only gives the camera security but it gives you the option to turn the camera from side to side and adjust the view of it. Really nice great quality product and even better ...you only need to purchase it 1 time bc its very well made. Excellent product and I'm very hard to please so thats huge for me to even say lol. Great job Guys !!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for apartments
reviews.reviewText: Easy to attach to door when live in apartments and no doorbell so battery great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT PRICING and Availability
reviews.reviewText: Love this Item , However Video of person at door is not available without purchasing a RING account after the 30 day trial period. It will send notification without picture

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was nice and served it's purpose for a while until it fell off the door and I went in another direction. The adhesive didn't last when I had to remove my doorbell to charge the battery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the flexibility and color. Works well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Look elsewhere for longevity
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these. The product itself is great. It doesn’t affect the motion sensor on my ring doorbell. It’s great quality in terms of protecting the ring from theft. I have to give it 1 star because the screw that you use to attach the metal faceplate is so tiny that it’s hard not to lose it. This product is better if your ring is wired and you dont need to keep removing the faceplate to charge the ring. I only have one screw left and the seller does not sell replacement screws. So one of my mounts are useless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Lockbox IMO
reviews.reviewText: I really liked this lockbox the most and it did not disappoint! I haven't had any connectivity problems, like some have reported. It's very sturdy, especially if you are able to mount with screws.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great if you don't want to make holes in your house
reviews.reviewText: I live in a condo building and I don't know if or when I might move to a new place and I didn't really want to make holes in the wall outside of my unit so I thought this was a great alternative for that problem and it makes installation of my Ring a lot easier as well if you have a disability.

Hubo una serie de problemas que surgieron con esta orden. El departamento de Servicio de BELGUCAN Global hizo un gran trabajo ayudando a resolver esos problemas. El producto es excelente para producir su inversión.
